name: A scuffed Super Hot remake
description:
a game made in 7 days, dont expect much + its my first time finishing and publishing a game lol controls :

 zqsd (sry qwerty users)

r to reload

p to enable / disable post processing

space to jump 

shift to run

right click to shoot

hope you enjoy the game, it does have plenty of bugs, remember its my first game

leave some comments so i can know what to add i plan on updating the game

i promise i'll add more levels fix bullet collison 

im not a 3d modler or animator and that thx to my friend who ge me the enemy moddle i will add animations later on and a pause menu

if u fell in level 3 u cant leave the game solution is to close it

jokes aside hope u win
